reason: Fading Bitcoin ETF optimism and a three-day outflow streak are signaling strong selling pressure, effectively erasing recent gains and pushing prices lower. The significant hack on Truebit further exacerbates market uncertainty and highlights smart contract security risks. While Ethereum staking activity shows underlying ecosystem strength, the immediate macro sentiment for Bitcoin is cautious and prone to further downside, necessitating a 'WATCH' approach.
headlines: A ruble stablecoin outpaced market leaders last year despite international sanctions
Ethereum treasury firm SharpLink stakes $170M ETH on Linea network
Bitcoin ETF optimism fades as three-day outflows streak erases early-month gains
Builders behind popular Zcash wallet Zashi to launch new startup 'cashZ'
Truebit token crashes 99.9% after hacker drains $26.6 million in ether
